<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bronze Bull Pendant](/Equipment.aspx?ID=202)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 566 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 7 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You attempt an Athletics check to Shove, but you haven't rolled yet

**Requirement** You are trained in Athletics
</row>

</column>

---

This pendant is forged from grainy steel and depicts a snorting bull’s face. The pendant must be attached to the chest area or on a shoulder guard. When you activate the pendant, you gain a +2 status bonus to the Athletics check to Shove, and if you roll a critical failure on the check, you get a failure instead.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Bronze Bull Pendant
